entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48461
  • @Html.AntiForgeryToken() invalidating previous tokens #48458
  • Detecting IIS 503s caused by multiple host instances #48457
  • .NET 6 Web API Project required Web.Config to work in Azure App Service (Windows) #48456
  • sourcelink dependency is out of date #48455
  • [Blazor] CascadingModelBinder rework. #48454
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Very odd bug in blazor wasm when calling a js browser extension #48453
  • Change the file extension of .razor to .raz #48452
  • [Blazor] Handle cascading values coming from multiple sources #48451
    8.0-preview6
  • Way to programmatically parse .razor (blazor) files and get an object model #48449
  • Component inheritance seems to be broken #48447
  • CSS variabels not recognized through Style boundle linking #48463
  • [Blazor] Introduce `[QueryParameter]` and `[FormParameter]` #48443
  • Startup assembly Microsoft.AspNetCore.AzureAppServices.HostingStartup failed to execute in Azure App service. #48442
  • IDX20803: Unable to obtain configuration from: 'System.String'. #48441
  • [Blazor] Obsolete AddServerSideBlazor #48440
  • ASP.NET Core Webhooks #48438
    Discussions
  • When I set builder.Logging.ClearProviders();, dotnet run stuck in building #48437
  • Improve side-by-side configuration of HTTP/1.1 and HTTP/2 endpoints #48436

Closed

  • Project option not working correctly for the `user-jwts` command #46218
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Calling `dotnet user-jwts` while app is running causes malformed appsettings #44869
    .NET 8 Planning
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template not correctly populating Identity Options. #47447
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Remove Duende from SPA and Blazor WASM project templates #47226
    8.0-preview5
  • Make RequestImageFileAsync customizable (or allow us to change BrowserFile data) #47743
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • [Blazor] Cache LayoutAttribute lookup #48439
    area-blazor

Merged

  • fix exception handler unit test #48459
    area-runtime, diagnostics, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6
  • Migrate RDF-specific tests to shared infrastructure (part 2) #48369
    feature-rdg, area-minimal, 8.0-preview6
  • Update project resolution and app settings writes in `dotnet user-jwts` #48385
    area-commandlinetools, feature-userjwts, 8.0-preview6
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview6
  • Remove IdentityServer from spa-templates #48430
    area-identity, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cb455a7` to `4580469` #48446
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `3881d5a` to `45228c8` #48445
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview6
  • Change API template to only use Invariant Globalization in Native AOT… #48238
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview6
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #48338
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Update SDK #48252
    area-infrastructure
  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2189042 #48387
    area-mvc
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
